name: Sheldon Cooper presents Fun with Flags
name_original: Sheldon Cooper presents Fun with Flags
description:
"Hello, I'm Dr. Sheldon Cooper, and welcome to Sheldon Cooper presents 'Fun with Flags'.

So, fellow flag enthusiasts, what sort of flag questions keep you awake at night?"

This a Fan, Fun, Educational, Parody, Pixel Game to test your vexology knowledge, you know, the study of flags, this funny trivia is based on popular tv show "Big Bang Theory"
